[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@contract-case/case-plugin-base](./case-plugin-base.md) &gt; [RawMatchError](./case-plugin-base.rawmatcherror.md)

## RawMatchError interface

Describes the data of an error encountered during an execution, where an expectation of a mock couldn't be met (eg, expected a call when we didn't get one)

Don't create these manually, use `failedExpectationError` to create them.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface RawMatchError 
```
